title: Cyberpunk Synthwave Music Pack
description: 10 seamlessly loopable, dark synthwave tracks designed for cyberpunk action adventure games and futuristic shooters.
longDescription:
This pack contains 10 seamlessly loopable music tracks (16-bit, 44.1kHz wav files) and 32 mins, 49 secs of original music.


This collection of dark synthwave tracks is specifically designed to add momentum and energy to fast-paced, action-packed games! Whether it’s a Cyberpunk shooter, sci-fi action-adventure, or dystopian RPG, if your game has cyberpunk, sci-fi, or futuristic elements, these synth-laden tracks will help immerse your player in that world. Thick walls of bass, driving drum rhythms, dizzying arpeggios, and icy synth leads saturate this blood-pumping music pack! Perfect for area exploration, fighting sequences, boss battles, and driving sims.


You can listen to the music pack in full before purchasing here: https://soundcloud.com/aleksis_tristan_shaw/sets/cyberpunk-synthwave


TRACKLIST:

Cyborgs Vs. Androids [3:04]

Cybernetic Breach [3:53]

Maverick Synth [4:47]

Off-Grid Outlaw [1:47]

Posthuman [3:12]

Resistance is Futile [3:07]
